title: Fragment, late 16th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet) on twill ground
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Fragment of salmon-colored twill with blue cut and uncut velvet in a symmetrical design of a highly conventionalized pomegranate. Small-scale pattern.
